name: 甘奈
text:
空いてる席、すぐ見つかって良かったよね☆
思ったよりゆっくりできそうで嬉しいなー
trans:
Good thing we found open seats so quickly☆ It's
great that we got to hang out and relax longer than
expected.

name: 甜花
text:
いつもは……混んでる……みたい、だけど……
狙い目の時間帯……あるって……
trans:
It always seems...... so busy... but...... we came at...
just the right time......

name: 甜花
text:
できたばっか……だけど、
人気のお店……だし……
trans:
It's so new...... and yet...
it's so popular... too......

name: 甜花
text: 甜花……ネットで、調べてきた……
trans: Tenka... looked it up... on the internet......

name: 千雪
text:
そうだったのね。ありがとう、甜花ちゃん♪
おかげでじっくり堪能できそう
trans:
I see. Thank you, Tenka-chan♪
We got to enjoy ourselves so much all thanks to you.

name: 甘奈
text: そうだよそうだよ、甘奈からもありがとっ！
trans: That's so true! Thanks from me too!

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe......

name: 甜花
text:
……ここなら……
なーちゃんが気に入るのも……きっと……ある……
trans:
There should be stuff... that you'd like... here too...
Naa-chan...

name: 甜花
text: もちろん……千雪さんが、好きそうなのも……！
trans:
And... there's stuff...
Chiyuki-san might like too... of course!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、ほんとう！
どこから見てこうか迷っちゃうな
trans:
Fufu, you're right!
I don't even know where to start looking.

name: 甘奈
text: あっ、その気持ちわかる～
trans: Yeah, I get what you mean～

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈、ここみたいに本棚がズラーって並んでるの見ると
ワクワクしちゃうもん
trans:
I get excited when I see all these bookshelves lined
up like this.

name: 甘奈
text:
どんな本があるのかなー、とか、
お楽しみが詰まってる感じ☆
trans:
It's like, I start to wonder what books are here,
and all that excitement just builds up inside☆

name: 甜花
text: ……にへへ……

name: 甜花
text:
……えっと……甜花、向こう、回ってくるね……
なーちゃんと千雪さんも、ゆっくり見てて……
trans:
......Um...... Tenka's gonna go... look around over there...
so you two... should take your time looking......

name: 甘奈
text:
オッケー☆
じゃあまた後でね、甜花ちゃん！
trans:
Okay☆
See ya later, Tenka-chan!

name: 甘奈
text:
これ、この間テレビで紹介してた小説だ
なんかね、すっごく泣けるお話なんだって！
trans:
Oh, I heard about this novel on TV the other day!
They said it was a major tearjerker!

name: 甘奈
text:
前から読みたかったんだ～
席に持ってっちゃおっかなー☆
trans:
I've wanted to read it for so long～
Maybe I should take it back to the table☆

name: 甘奈
text:
……あ！　買いそびれてたやつもある！
どーしよ、新しい方の中身も気になるし……
trans:
... Ah! There's one I didn't get to buy the other time!
What I do... I want to look through the new one too...

name: 千雪
text:
待ち時間なんかに、ファッション誌を読んでるところは
見たことあったけど……
trans:
I've seen you read fashion magazines while waiting
before...

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃんはこういう本も読んでるのね
trans: I didn't know you read books like these too.

name: 甘奈
text: えへへー……やっぱ意外って感じ、する？
trans: Eheheh... I guess you didn't expect me to?

name: 甘奈
text:
最近は時間がなくてあんまりなんだけど、
前は本屋さんとか、こういうところにも来てたんだー
trans:
I haven't had time to do it much lately, but I used to
go bookstores and places like this a lot.

name: 甘奈
text:
家の近くにね、ここと比べたら隠れ家って感じなんだけど、
静かで、のんびりできるお店があるの
trans:
Near our house, there's a quiet little place like this
where you can just relax. It's more like a hiding spot
compared to this store though.

name: 甘奈
text: 学校帰りとかに、ちょーっと寄ってみたり
trans:
I've stopped by a few times, on the way back from
school and stuff.

name: 千雪
text: ……そっかぁ。本が好きなの？
trans: ...I see. Do you like books a lot then?

name: 甘奈
text: うーん……そういうわけでもないんだけど……
trans: Hmm... I don't dislike them...

name: 甘奈
text:
……なんだろ……たまに思い切って、
難しい本とか、読んでみたりしてたかな
trans:
... It's more like... You know, sometimes, I'd feel like
getting through a difficult book or two once in a
while.

name: 甘奈
text:
内容はわからないはずなのに……
開くとね、どの本もキラキラして見えたの
trans:
Even though I couldn't possibly know or understand
everything... Whenever I open them, these books seem
like they all have something amazing waiting inside.

name: 甘奈
text:
……甘奈、やりたいこととか、将来の夢とか
あんまりなかったから
trans:
... I've never really had anything I really wanted to do,
or any dreams I wanted to aim for.

name: 甘奈
text:
だから……多分、そういう体験が、
……楽しかったんだよね
trans:
So... having these kinds of experiences...
It's a lot of fun for me.

name: 千雪
text: ……素敵
trans: ...That's wonderful.

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃんはきっと、本と出会う時に、
その本を書いた人とも出会えちゃうのね
trans:
Amana-chan, I'm sure that whenever you meet a new
book, you're able to meet the author themselves too.

name: 甘奈
text: そ、そうなのかな……？
trans: Y-You think so?

name: 千雪
text:
ええ、きっと
……ね、甘奈ちゃん。私も今日は素敵な出会いがしたいな
trans:
Yes, definitely. Hey, Amana-chan. I'd love to get to
know a nice book today too.

name: 千雪
text: 何かおすすめ、教えてもらえない？
trans: Is there anything you'd recommend?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっ？　えーっと……千雪さんだったら……
……そうだなー……これとか！
trans:
Hm? Hmm... For you... maybe...
Right, maybe this kind of thing!

name: 千雪
text: わぁ、和小物の本ね！
trans: Awww, it's a book about Japanese-style trinkets!

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんの雑貨って洋風なイメージだから、
たまにはこっち路線もいいかな？　と思って。……どう？
trans:
I thought that, since a lot of your crafts look pretty
Western-style, maybe you'd like to try something
like this for a change. What do you think?

name: 千雪
text:
──すごい……
自分で作る時にも参考になりそう……
trans:
──Wow... This'll be really useful when I make them
myself...

name: 甜花
text: ……あ……ふたりとも、いた……
trans: ......Oh...... There you are......

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん！
いいの見つかった？
trans:
Tenka-chan!
You find something good?

name: 甜花
text:
本は……まだ、だけど……
千雪さんに、見せたいの、あって……
trans:
Tenka hasn't... found anything yet...... but... there's
something... she wants to show Chiyuki-san......

name: 千雪
text: 私に？　何かしら
trans: Show me? What is it?

name: 甜花
text:
その本の……表紙みたいな、飾り……
向こうに、あった……
trans:
There was... an accessory... like the one on that
book's cover... right there.

name: 甘奈
text: そっか、こういうとこって雑貨も置いてたりするもんね
trans:
Oh, that's right. This place sells little crafts and
accessories like that too.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……あの、だから……
行って……みない……？
trans:
Yeah...... Um... so......
Wanna go... look......?

name: 千雪
text:
ぜひ！
ありがとう、甜花ちゃん♪
trans:
Yes, let's!
Thank you, Tenka-chan♪

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe......

name: 千雪
text: わぁ……！
trans: Awww...!

name: 甘奈
text: すごーい！　かわいーの、いっぱいあるね☆
trans: Woah! There's so much cute stuff☆

name: 千雪
text:
これ……素敵……！
私、こういう花の飾りが大好きなの……！
trans:
These are... wonderful...!
I just love these kind of flower accessories... !

name: 甘奈
text:
ホントだ、千雪さんに似合いそう！
ねぇねぇ、着けてみようよ？
trans:
Oh you're right, that would look so cute on you!
Try it on, try it on!

name: 千雪
text: うん、それじゃあ……
trans: Okay, I will...

name: 甜花
text:
ふわ……
千雪さん、綺麗……！
trans:
Woah......
You're so pretty... Chiyuki-san......!

name: 千雪
text: きっと飾りが可愛いからね
trans: It's all because this ornament is so pretty.

name: 甘奈
text: そんなことないよー！
trans: That's not true!

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、ううん、飾りはもちろんかわいーけど、
千雪さんだってかわいーもん☆
trans:
Oh, I mean, the ornament is really cute, but, it's only
as cute as it is because it's on you☆

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、甘奈ちゃん……
trans: Fufu, Amana-chan...

name: 千雪
text: あのね、このお花の飾りは、『つまみ』っていうの
trans:
You know, this hair ornament with a flower is called a
"Tsumami".

name: 千雪
text:
布をつまんで作るからこういう名前がついたんだけど、
もともとは、江戸時代から伝わってる細工なんだ
trans:
It gets its name from how it's made by "pinching"
cloth like this. It dates back all the way to the Edo
period.

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……雑貨の、先生……
trans: You could be like a...... trinket teacher......

name: 甘奈
text:
やっぱりすごいなあ～☆
それに、その飾りのことも大好きって感じ！
trans:
You really are amazing～☆
And you look like you really do love this ornament.

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん、買わないの？
trans: Why don't you buy it, Chiyuki-san?

name: 千雪
trans: Hmmm...!

name: 千雪
text:
……買っちゃいたいけど……
今日はそんなつもりじゃなかったし……
trans:
... I'd like to, but...
That's not what we're here for...

name: 千雪
text: ……みんなで、本選びに戻りましょうか
trans: ...Maybe we should get back to looking for books.

name: 甘奈
text: ええー、すっごくかわいーのに
trans: Whaaa, but it's so cute...

name: 甜花
text: ……もったい、ない……
trans: ......What a waste......

name: 千雪
text: ううん、いいの！
trans: Oh no, don't worry about it!

name: 千雪
text:
それより……ちょっとはしゃいじゃった
ごめんなさい……！
trans:
It really made me happy that you liked it.
I'm sorry...!

name: 千雪
text: ……あら、もうこんな時間
trans: ...Oh, look at the time!

name: 甘奈
text:
わ、ホントだー！
さすがにそろそろ帰らなきゃだよね？
trans: Oh, you're right! We've gotta get back, don't we?

name: 甜花
text:
じゃあ……
甜花……本、戻してくるね……
trans: Alright then...... Tenka's gonna... return this book......

name: 千雪
text: 私たちも支度しなきゃね、甘奈ちゃん
trans: Alright, then let's get ready, shall we Amana-chan?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん──
……ねぇ、千雪さん
trans:
Hmmm──
...Hey, Chiyuki-san.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん……きっと、甘奈と甜花ちゃんが行きたいところを
優先してくれたんだよね
trans:
You said... you wanted to go where we wanted to go,
and prioritized our ideas, didn't you?

name: 甘奈
text: 小物とかも……もっと見たかったよね
trans:
But maybe... you wanted to take a longer look at the
ornaments and stuff?

name: 千雪
text:
何言ってるの、甘奈ちゃん
全然そんなことないのよ
trans: What are you saying, Amana-chan? Of course not.

name: 甘奈
text: 帰りがけにもう１回、雑貨のコーナー寄っていく？
trans:
Do you want to take another look at the ornaments
before we head out?

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、大丈夫
ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん♪
trans:
It's okay, really.
Thank you, Amana-chan♪

name: 甘奈
trans: ...Jeez...

name: 甘奈
text: ……こちらこそありがとう、千雪さん
trans: ...I should be the one thanking you, Chiyuki-san.

name: 甘奈
text:
──よーし、甘奈も片付けてこよーっと☆
甜花ちゃん、待ってー！
trans:
──Okay, time to pack my stuff up too☆
Tenka-chan, wait up!

name: 千雪
text: ……ふふ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 千雪
text: すっかり遅くなっちゃったね
trans: It's gotten pretty late, hasn't it?

name: 甘奈
text:
楽しい時間ってあっという間なんだもーん……
もうちょっといられたら良かったのに～
trans:
Only because we were having so much fun...
I wish we could have stayed here longer～

name: 甜花
text: ……なーちゃん……楽しかった……？
trans: ......Did you have fun... Naa-chan......?

name: 甘奈
text: うん！　すっごく☆
trans: Yeah! A ton☆

name: 甘奈
text:
ほらっ、この前話してた小説がね、
読んでみたら思った以上の超大作で……！
trans:
Hey, you know that novel we talked about before? I
took a look, and it's even more of a masterpiece than
I thought it'd be!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんにも絶対おすすめって感じだったよ☆
trans:
It's so good I'd even recommend it to you,
Tenka-chan☆

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……すごそう……
trans: Nihehe...... That sounds good......

name: 甘奈
text:
今度、続きとあわせて買ってくるから、
一緒に読もう？
trans:
I'll get it next time, along with the rest of the series,
maybe we could read it together?

name: 甜花
text: うん、楽しみ……！
trans: Yeah... That seems fun......!
